an7.617:4.1: “Mendicants, for insight into greed, seven things should be developed.
an7.617:4.3: The perceptions of ugliness, death, repulsiveness in food, dissatisfaction with the whole world, impermanence, suffering in impermanence, and not-self in suffering.
an7.617:4.4: These seven things should be developed for insight into greed.”
